snippet: A takeover of EMC, which has a total enterprise value of $50.8 billion, would answer years of questions about the fate of the company.
abstract: Dell Inc is in discussions to buy data storage company EMC.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and QUENTIN HARDY

lead_paragraph: A takeover of EMC, which has a total enterprise value of $50.8 billion, would answer years of questions about the fate of the company.

headline.main: Dell Is Said to Be in Talks to Acquire EMC
headline.print_headline: Computer Maker Dell Is in Talks to Buy a Data Storage Company
